headline: AppLovin: You Should Definitely Buy The Dip
summary: AppLovin sharpens focus on its growing ad platform, divests Apps business for $900M, and targets e-commerce. Learn more about APP stock here.

headline: Hayden Capital Q4 2024 Letter
summary:
During Q4 2024, Hayden Capital's portfolio rose +19.4% vs. +2.4% for the S&P 500 and -
0.8% for the MSCI World indices. Click here to read the full letter.
